item.title: About
item.description: Hello. I’m a ML Compiler Engineer at Qualcomm working on Apache TVM for Hexagon DSP. TVM is an open source end to end machine learning compiler framework. I also work on the Hexagon backend for LLVM , which is the core compiler for Hexagon DSP, and is also the backend target for the TVM compiler. I have a masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science from Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad, where I focused primarily on compiler optimizations and High Performance Computing.
